synthesis_conditions.drying_method: activated at 373 K under high vacuum
synthesis_conditions.additional_information: The material is isostructural to Tb-MOF-76, crystallized in a P4122 space group. The framework possesses square channels with free NH2 groups pointing into the channels, which decreases the pore dimensions to 7.2 × 7.2 Å2 from 7.9 × 7.9 Å2 in Tb-MOF-76.

synthesis_conditions.drying_method: activated at 373 K under high vacuum
synthesis_conditions.additional_information: The material is mentioned as a platform for NH2 functionalization, implying its synthesis under similar conditions to Tb-MOF-76(NH2) but using BTC instead of NH2-BTC.
